00040 guint signals[LAST_SIGNAL] = { 0 };

00045 static void
00046 gpm_object_init (GPMObject *obj) { }
00047 
00048 static void
00049 gpm_object_class_init (GPMObjectClass *klass)
00050 {
00051     signals[MAINS_CHANGED] =
00052         g_signal_new ("mains_status_changed",
00053             G_OBJECT_CLASS_TYPE (klass),
00054             G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_DETAILED,
00055             0, NULL, NULL,
00056             g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__BOOLEAN,
00057             G_TYPE_NONE, 1, G_TYPE_BOOLEAN);
00058     signals[ACTION_ABOUT_TO_HAPPEN] =
00059         g_signal_new ("action_about_to_happen",
00060             G_OBJECT_CLASS_TYPE (klass),
00061             G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_DETAILED,
00062             0, NULL, NULL,
00063             g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__BOOLEAN,
00064             G_TYPE_NONE, 1, G_TYPE_BOOLEAN);
00065     signals[PERFORMING_ACTION] =
00066         g_signal_new ("performing_action",
00067             G_OBJECT_CLASS_TYPE (klass),
00068             G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_DETAILED,
00069             0, NULL, NULL,
00070             g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__BOOLEAN,
00071             G_TYPE_NONE, 1, G_TYPE_BOOLEAN);
00072 }
00073 
00080 gboolean
00081 gpm_object_register (void)
00082 {
00083     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00084     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00085         return FALSE;
00086     g_assert (session_connection);
00087     if (!dbus_get_service (session_connection, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE))
00088         return FALSE;
00089     obj = g_object_new (gpm_object_get_type (), NULL);
00090     dbus_g_connection_register_g_object (session_connection, GPM_DBUS_PATH, G_OBJECT (obj));
00091     return TRUE;
00092 }
00093 
00099 gboolean
00100 gpm_emit_about_to_happen (const gint value)
00101 {
00102     g_signal_emit (obj, signals[ACTION_ABOUT_TO_HAPPEN], 0, value);
00103     return TRUE;
00104 }

00255 #if 0
00256 #include <glib.h>
00257 #include <string.h>
00258 #include <dbus/dbus.h>
00259 #include <dbus/dbus-glib.h>
00260 #include "gpm-main.h"
00261 #include "gpm-common.h"
00262 #include "gpm-dbus-server.h"
00263 
00264 GPtrArray *registered;
00265 
00271 static gint
00272 vetoFindName (const gchar *dbusName)
00273 {
00274     int a;
00275     RegProgram *regprog;
00276     for (a=0;a<registered->len;a++) {
00277         regprog = (RegProgram *) g_ptr_array_index (registered, a);
00278         if (strcmp (regprog->dbusName->str, dbusName) == 0) {
00279             return a;
00280         }
00281     }
00282     return -1;
00283 }
00284 
00290 static gboolean
00291 vetoACK (const gchar *dbusName, gint flags)
00292 {
00293     g_return_val_if_fail (registered, FALSE);
00294     g_return_val_if_fail (dbusName, FALSE);
00295 
00296     int a = vetoFindName (dbusName);
00297     if (a == -1) {
00298         g_warning ("Program '%s' sent vetoACK.\n"
00299                "It MUST call vetoActionRegisterInterest first!", dbusName);
00300         return FALSE;
00301     }
00302 
00303     RegProgram *regprog = (RegProgram *) g_ptr_array_index (registered, a);
00304 
00305     GString *flagtext = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (flags);
00306     g_debug ("vetoACK received from %s\n"
00307          " ENUM = %s, Application = %s\n", dbusName, flagtext->str, regprog->appName->str);
00308     g_string_free (flagtext, TRUE);
00309 
00310     regprog->isACK = TRUE;
00311     return TRUE;
00312 }
00313 
00320 static gboolean
00321 vetoNACK (const gchar *dbusName, gint flags, gchar *reason)
00322 {
00323     g_return_val_if_fail (registered, FALSE);
00324     g_return_val_if_fail (dbusName, FALSE);
00325 
00326     int a = vetoFindName (dbusName);
00327     if (a == -1) {
00328         g_warning ("Program '%s' sent vetoNACK.\n"
00329                "It MUST call vetoActionRegisterInterest first!", dbusName);
00330         return FALSE;
00331     }
00332 
00333     RegProgram *regprog = (RegProgram *) g_ptr_array_index (registered, a);
00334 
00335     GString *flagtext = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (flags);
00336     g_debug ("vetoNACK received from %s\n"
00337          " ENUM = %s, Reason = %s\n", dbusName, flagtext->str, reason);
00338     g_string_free (flagtext, TRUE);
00339 
00340     regprog->isNACK = TRUE;
00341     regprog->reason = g_string_new (reason);
00342     return TRUE;
00343 }
00344 
00351 static gboolean
00352 vetoActionRegisterInterest (const gchar *dbusName, gint flags, gchar *appName)
00353 {
00354     g_return_val_if_fail (registered, FALSE);
00355 
00356     int a;
00357     a = vetoFindName (dbusName);
00358     if (a != -1) {
00359         g_warning ("Program '%s' has already called "
00360                "vetoActionRegisterInterest on this DBUS connection!", appName);
00361         return FALSE;
00362     }
00363 
00364     GString *flagtext = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (flags);
00365     g_debug ("vetoActionRegisterInterest received from %s\n"
00366          " ENUM = %s, Application = %s\n", dbusName, flagtext->str, appName);
00367     g_string_free (flagtext, TRUE);
00368 
00369     RegProgram *reg = g_new (RegProgram, 1);
00370     reg->flags = flags;
00371     reg->dbusName = g_string_new (dbusName);
00372     reg->appName = g_string_new (appName);
00373     reg->reason = NULL;
00374     reg->isACK = FALSE;
00375     reg->isNACK = FALSE;
00376     g_ptr_array_add (registered, (gpointer) reg);
00377     return TRUE;
00378 }
00379 
00385 static gboolean
00386 vetoActionUnregisterInterest (const gchar *dbusName, gint flags, gboolean suppressError)
00387 {
00388     g_return_val_if_fail (registered, FALSE);
00389 
00390     int a = vetoFindName (dbusName);
00391     if (a == -1) {
00392         if (!suppressError)
00393             g_warning ("Program '%s' has called vetoActionUnregisterInterest "
00394                "without calling vetoActionRegisterInterest!", dbusName);
00395         return FALSE;
00396     }
00397 
00398     RegProgram *regprog = (RegProgram *) g_ptr_array_index (registered, a);
00399     GString *flagtext = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (flags);
00400     g_debug ("vetoActionUnregisterInterest received from %s\n"
00401              " ENUM = %s, Application = %s\n", regprog->dbusName->str,
00402             flagtext->str, regprog->appName->str);
00403     g_string_free (flagtext, TRUE);
00404 
00405     /* remove from list */
00406     g_ptr_array_remove_index (registered, a);
00407     g_free (regprog);
00408     return TRUE;
00409 }
00410 
00411 DBusHandlerResult
00412 dbus_signal_filter (DBusConnection *connection, DBusMessage *message, void *user_data)
00413 {
00414     /* User data is the event loop we are running in */
00415     /* A signal from the connection saying we are about to be disconnected */
00416     if (dbus_message_is_signal (message, DBUS_INTERFACE_DBUS, "NameOwnerChanged")) {
00417         char *oldservicename = NULL;
00418         char *newservicename = NULL;
00419         if (!dbus_message_get_args (message, NULL,
00420                         DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &oldservicename,
00421                         DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &newservicename,
00422                         DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00423             g_warning ("Invalid NameOwnerChanged signal from bus!");
00424             return DBUS_HANDLER_RESULT_NOT_YET_HANDLED;
00425         }
00426         g_debug ("'%s' -> '%s'\n", oldservicename, newservicename);
00427         if (newservicename && strlen(newservicename) > 0) {
00428             g_warning ("Disconnected due to crash '%s'", newservicename);
00429             vetoActionUnregisterInterest (newservicename, GPM_DBUS_ALL, TRUE);
00430         }
00431         return DBUS_HANDLER_RESULT_HANDLED;
00432     }
00433     return DBUS_HANDLER_RESULT_NOT_YET_HANDLED;
00434 }
00435 
00436 DBusMessage *
00437 dbus_method_handler (DBusMessage *message, DBusError *error)
00438 {
00439     DBusMessage *message_reply;
00440 
00441     if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "isActive")) {
00442         g_debug ("Got 'isActive'\n");
00443         if (!dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00444             g_warning ("Incorrect arguments 'bool isActive(void)'");
00445             return NULL;
00446             }
00447         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00448         gboolean data_value = TRUE;
00449         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00450         return message_reply;
00451     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "isUserIdle")) {
00452         g_debug ("Got 'isUserIdle'\n");
00453         if (!dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00454             g_warning ("Incorrect arguments 'bool isUserIdle(void)'");
00455             return NULL;
00456             }
00457         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00458         gboolean data_value = FALSE; 
00459         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00460         return message_reply;
00461     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "vetoACK")) {
00462         g_debug ("Got 'vetoACK'\n");
00463         gint value;
00464         gboolean data_value = FALSE;
00465         const gchar *from = dbus_message_get_sender (message);
00466         if (dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INT32, &value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00467             data_value = vetoACK (from, value);
00468         } else {
00469             g_warning ("vetoACK received, but error getting message: %s", error->message);
00470             dbus_error_free (error);
00471         }
00472         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00473         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00474         return message_reply;
00475     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "vetoNACK")) {
00476         g_debug ("Got 'vetoNACK'\n");
00477         gint value;
00478         gboolean data_value = FALSE;
00479         char *reason;
00480         const gchar *from = dbus_message_get_sender (message);
00481         if (dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INT32, &value, DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &reason, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00482             data_value = vetoNACK (from, value, reason);
00483         } else {
00484             g_warning ("vetoNACK received, but error getting message: %s", error->message);
00485             dbus_error_free (error);
00486         }
00487         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00488         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00489         return message_reply;
00490     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "vetoActionRegisterInterest")) {
00491         g_debug ("Got 'vetoActionRegisterInterest'\n");
00492         gint value;
00493         gboolean data_value = FALSE;
00494         char *appname;
00495         const gchar *from = dbus_message_get_sender (message);
00496         if (dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INT32, &value, DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &appname, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00497             data_value = vetoActionRegisterInterest (from, value, appname);
00498         } else {
00499             g_warning ("vetoActionRegisterInterest received, but error getting message: %s", error->message);
00500             dbus_error_free (error);
00501         }
00502         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00503         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00504         return message_reply;
00505     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "vetoActionUnregisterInterest")) {
00506         g_debug ("Got 'vetoActionUnregisterInterest'\n");
00507         gint value;
00508         gboolean data_value = FALSE;
00509         const gchar *from = dbus_message_get_sender (message);
00510         if (dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INT32, &value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00511             data_value = vetoActionUnregisterInterest (from, value, TRUE);
00512         } else {
00513             g_warning ("vetoActionUnregisterInterest received, but error getting message: %s", error->message);
00514             dbus_error_free (error);
00515         }
00516         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00517         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00518         return message_reply;
00519     } else if (dbus_message_is_method_call (message, GPM_DBUS_SERVICE, "isRunningOnMains")) {
00520         g_debug ("Got 'isRunningOnMains'\n");
00521         if (!dbus_message_get_args (message, error, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00522             g_warning ("Incorrect arguments 'bool isRunningOnMains(void)'");
00523             return NULL;
00524             }
00525         message_reply = dbus_message_new_method_return (message);
00526         gboolean data_value = TRUE; 
00527         dbus_message_append_args (message_reply, DBUS_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &data_value, DBUS_TYPE_INVALID);
00528         return message_reply;
00529     }
00530     return NULL;
00531 }
00532 
00533 static DBusMessage *
00534 dbus_create_error_reply (DBusMessage *message)
00535 {
00536     char *msg;
00537     DBusMessage *reply;
00538 
00539     if (dbus_message_get_type (message) != DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_METHOD_CALL)
00540         return dbus_message_new_error (message,
00541                            GPM_DBUS_INTERFACE_ERROR,
00542                            "Message type is not message_call");
00543 
00544     msg = g_strdup_printf ("Unknown method name '%s' on interface '%s'",
00545                  dbus_message_get_member (message),
00546                  dbus_message_get_interface (message));
00547     reply = dbus_message_new_error (message, GPM_DBUS_INTERFACE_ERROR, msg);
00548     g_free (msg);
00549 
00550     return reply;
00551 }
